extendedInfo.description: Pack your parachute and jump down the highest buildings in the world and experience the amazing feeling of Stickman Base Jumper! Estimate your run up and perfectly time your jump off to glide through the air, perform insane proximity flights, jump in darkest nights, defy heavy winds and make perfect landings when deploying your parachute.âââââ Regular content updates with new and amazing levels coming every few weeks! âââââ â¢ From the makers of various top 100 apps like Stick Stunt Biker, Rope'n'Fly, Stickman Cliff Diving, Wingsuit Stickman, Line Runner, Line Birds, Line Surfer, RunStickRun and more FEATURES: â¢ 30 beautiful designed levels from "Easy jumping" to "Insane proximity flights" â¢ Full animated physic rag doll â¢ Spectacular crashes â¢ Amazing Retina Graphics â¢ Complete physics enabled â¢ Day/Night mode with realistic lighting â¢ and many more... Feel free to post your ideas, we will try to implement them as soon as possible Thank you very much for all your support and interest in our games! We would love to hear your suggestions!PERFORMANCE HINT:If you have performance problems or the game is running slow on your device make sure you disable display power saving

reviews.title: Lots of fun
reviews.comment: Easy to learn, addicting, and lots of fun! Well done!
reviews.author: John Alexander

reviews.title: Super fun and difficult.
reviews.comment: This game offers a difficult challenge but when you finish a mission it feels great. Also it is completely, just a little add at the top.
reviews.author: Nick Hadzaman

reviews.title: Pretty addictive
reviews.comment: Have completed all jumps with score of atleast 950 on my old phone. Liked this game so much I think I will do it again. Challenging and a good filler of time when needed.
reviews.author: Michael Detrick

reviews.title: Great Game!
reviews.comment: Awesome Game! Lots of fun. Can\'t stop playing. Fun as hell when you Die! Must download!!

reviews.comment: Simoke easy fun and free lits of entertainment fir the kids great game! Goid job!
reviews.author: Joe Kukowski

reviews.title: stickman basejumper
reviews.comment: I think this is one of the best games out there along with all the other djinnworks games. So I would definitley reccomend this game to everyone above the age of 8 and you are pretty much guaranteed fun if you dont give up too easily and 5 stars from me.
reviews.author: Finley Parker

reviews.title: Good game.
reviews.comment: This game is alot of fun, except for the fact that it bugs you after every 3 attempts to rate. In fact, that one thing is so annoying that I almost deleted it by the end of the first world,and even before rating it. Otherwise, this game is a spectacular idea with cool stages and decent physics applied.
reviews.author: Scott Vachon

reviews.title: Really great game...
reviews.comment: Excellent game. Basic but excellently done. Very funny sounds. Love the sounds of stickman crashing against the floor. One of my fave games and I take some impressing. Well done 5*
